SELECT B.BOM_CD_CODE, B.BOM_CD_NAME, B.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE, F.FIN_PRD_CD_NAME, B.LINE_CD_HD_CODE, L.LINE_CD_HD_NAME, B.BOM_CD_PROD_VOL, B.BOM_CD_UNIT, B.BOM_CD_USE, NVL(B.BOM_CD_REMK,' ') AS BOM_CD_REMK FROM BF_CMN_BOM_CODE B JOIN BF_CMN_FINISH_PRODUCT_CODE F ON F.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE = B.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE JOIN BF_CMN_LINE_CODE_HD L ON B.LINE_CD_HD_CODE = L.LINE_CD_HD_CODE
WHERE F.FIN_PRD_CD_NAME LIKE '%'||#{finName}||'%'
ORDER BY B.BOM_CD_CODE

SELECT L.LINE_CD_HD_CODE, L.LINE_CD_HD_NAME, NVL(B.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE,' ') AS FIN_PRD_CD_CODE, NVL(F.FIN_PRD_CD_NAME,' ') AS FIN_PRD_CD_NAME FROM BF_CMN_LINE_CODE_HD L LEFT OUTER JOIN BF_CMN_BOM_CODE B ON L.LINE_CD_HD_CODE = B.LINE_CD_HD_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN BF_CMN_FINISH_PRODUCT_CODE F ON B.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE = F.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE ORDER BY LINE_CD_HD_CODE

SELECT L.LINE_CD_CODE, L.PROC_CD_CODE, P.PROC_CD_NAME, L.MCHN_CODE, M.MCHN_NAME FROM BF_CMN_LINE_CODE L JOIN BF_CMN_PROC_CODE P ON L.PROC_CD_CODE = P.PROC_CD_CODE JOIN BF_EQP_MCHN M ON L.MCHN_CODE = M.MCHN_CODE WHERE LINE_CD_HD_CODE = #{lineCode} ORDER BY LINE_CD_CODE
